submitJob: You are good to submit your job post. Once you submit, your job post will be ready to send to the agencies.
reviewJobAlert: Do you want to review the job post before submitting?
readytoSubmit: The job is ready to be submitted and send to agency.
approveAlert: Once approved you will not be able to make any changes.
rejectAlert: Once rejected the job is marked inactive and no further edits will be allowed.
clearDataAlert: Are you sure you want to clear all the unsaved data?
question: Question
certplaceholder: Eg: Global Information Assurance Certification etc
unsavedAlert: You have unsaved changes on this page. Do you want to leave this page ?
candReadyfrEmployer: Your candidate is ready to be sent to the employer..
reviewCandAlert: Do you want to review the candidate before submitting?
subscribeAlert: You do not have an active subscription. To submit a candidate please add a payment method under settings.
subscriptionAlertAdmin: It looks like you do not have an active subscription. Please contact your administrator.
uploadalert: The uploaded image should be less than 150Kb in size..
name: Name
